original_text: On the tenth day of the first month the people went up from the Jordan and camped at Gilgal on the eastern border of Jericho.
korean_text: 첫째 달 십일에 백성이 요단에서 올라와 여리고 동쪽 경계 길갈에 진 치매

sentences.original_text: On the tenth day of the first month
the people went up from the Jordan
on the eastern border of Jericho.
